page.title: 10Housing
page.content: In our rural area of Herefordshire nothing much has changed in the last fifty or a hundred years. The majority of houses are situated in the two villages of Bromsash and Aston Crews and the small hamlet of Ryeford. There were a lot of farmhouses,we counted 14.The most common type of house was detached and built before 1900.There were also a lot of pre 1900 semi-detached and 7 rows of terraces. Between 1900 and 1945 there was a little building,mainly semi-detached; after 1945 there was a development of 26 bungalows on an estate at Bromsash. All together in our area we counted 153 houses.Of these 77 were pre 1900, 43 were pre 1945,and 33 were built since 1945.
